Global footer

Global footer

Site footer design for business.gov.au

On this page
  • Visual design
  • Guidelines for use
  • Layouts
  • Examples and assets

Visual design

Design view:

Mobile design

Desktop designs can be viewed on screens wider than 650px.

Guidelines for use.

Purpose:

Provides navigation, social media and contact options at the bottom of site pages.

When to use this component:

  • Used across every page of the website to ensure a consistent user experience.

Layouts

Page layouts

The global footer is used on full width and 2/3 width pages.

Component layout options

Full width layout

Desktop, Tablet & Mobile: One component per page. The global footer background colour is wider than the body content and extends the full width of the screen.

Examples and assets

View global footer design and assets in Adobe XD.

ADOBE XD

View the site footer on business.gov.au
